name: Pixeledo
description:
Pixeledo is a Casual Pixel Art Battle Royale Browser Game. Control your character throughout a top-down tile-based world with 100 other players and try to be the last player alive as the map shrinks around you. The world is destructive and destroying tiles can spawn ammo, health, or new weapons, but also spawns creatures that that will make survival more challenging.

Full game can be played at pixeledo.com.
